data.message: Thank You Facebook for all the positive people could have come to know...knowledge that I have gained.and lost loved onesI found and reunited with...and special groups were very encouraging and supportive ...on day to day struggles...living life on life's terms .....and special postings keeping me on solid ground and bringing me closer to my higher power

replies.message: We're so happy you're enjoying your Facebook experience, Karl! Thanks for being part of our community. -Hailey
Is there any way I can remove my ad preferences? I don't want to receive adds, and I find the fact that you are monitoring my search habits absurd. Please assist.
